sources.name: Number of survey observations in Povcal per decade
sources.description:
Data published by Our World in Data team's own calculation based on Povcal by the World Bank
Calculated 09 February 2017
Link http://iresearch.worldbank.org/PovcalNet/

This is the number of available survey data on poverty measures in Povcal by decade. 2014 refers to the available surveys in the period 2005-2014; 2004 refers to 1995-2004; 1994 refers to 1985-1994.

The idea for this measure is inspired by Serajuddin, Uematsu, Wieser, Yoshida, and Dabalen (2015) – ‘Data deprivation: another deprivation to end’, World Bank Policy Research Working Paper no. WPS 7252

variables.name: Observations in PovcalNet per decade
variables.description: Number of available survey data on poverty measures in PovcalNet by decade.
